title: Justaboredrandomguy
author: Justaboredrandomguy
content: I need 10M worth of BTC. Transaction will take place in a bank of your choice in Philippines, Friday Morning. If you have this amount and willing to work please contact me back ASAP!Thank you,Regards.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: While you're at it, I need it too!

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Well, this sounds legit. Especially when I looked at your username - you're serious person.Quote from: LoyceMobile on January 11, 2023, 08:39:46 PMWhile you're at it, I need it too!I'll be modest and $5M in BTC would be enough for me.

comments.author: Justaboredrandomguy
comments.body: Guys this is not a Joke thread.   I really need this by friday.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Justaboredrandomguy on January 11, 2023, 08:38:43 PMI need 10M worth of BTC. Transaction will take place in a bank of your choice in Philippines, Friday Morning. If you have this amount and willing to work please contact me back ASAP!Thank you,Regards.Do you think you can just come here and start jabbing with your audio offer. Your first post aboard this platform likely portrays you to be a scammer. How on Earth do you explain this that you just got registered on a platform and what you could do first is to  make a demand of such offer and who on do you think would listen to you. Since you could go to the bank to make payment for such amount of btc then it means btc is legal in your country. Why not get registered on a well known centralised exchange scale through kyc and make use of their p2p platform to make purchase of btc worth the amount you want. I think this would be easier and another too you would be on the safe side preserving your identity as well.Remember the phrase" not your keys,not your coin" after purchaseDyor!!

comments.author: Justaboredrandomguy
comments.body: Quote from: LTU_btc on January 11, 2023, 08:55:35 PMWell, this sounds legit. Especially when I looked at your username - you're serious person.Quote from: LoyceMobile on January 11, 2023, 08:39:46 PMWhile you're at it, I need it too!I'll be modest and $5M in BTC would be enough for me.And my username got nothing to do with this, especially if you know 1 or 2 about opsec! I need individuals who can get this done on this thread... And again, I bet fingers aint all the same; with due respect if anyone who doesn't have that kind of amount to trade kindly skip this thread, keep trolling. And yes this transaction will take place in a bank with crypto on escrow. all transactions will be handled by bank employees. So if you've never heard of anything like "Buy crypto with cash" then this thread aint for you. Please skip.Thank you,

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Justaboredrandomguy on January 11, 2023, 09:19:01 PMQuote from: LTU_btc on January 11, 2023, 08:55:35 PMWell, this sounds legit. Especially when I looked at your username - you're serious person.Quote from: LoyceMobile on January 11, 2023, 08:39:46 PMWhile you're at it, I need it too!I'll be modest and $5M in BTC would be enough for me.And my username got nothing to do with this, especially if you know 1 or 2 about opsec! I need individuals who can get this done on this thread... And again, I bet fingers aint all the same; with due respect if anyone who doesn't have that kind of amount to trade kindly skip this thread, keep trolling. And yes this transaction will take place in a bank with crypto on escrow. all transactions will be handled by bank employees. So if you've never heard of anything like "Buy crypto with cash" then this thread aint for you. Please skip.Thank you,There would not be hardly anyone on the forum with that amount. Why wouldn't you just purchase from an exchange? You may not be able to buy 10m worth but you'll be able to get some of your needs fulfilled.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Quote from: Justaboredrandomguy on January 11, 2023, 09:19:01 PMAnd my username got nothing to do with this, especially if you know 1 or 2 about opsec! I need individuals who can get this done on this thread... And again, I bet fingers aint all the same; with due respect if anyone who doesn't have that kind of amount to trade kindly skip this thread, keep trolling. And yes this transaction will take place in a bank with crypto on escrow. all transactions will be handled by bank employees. So if you've never heard of anything like "Buy crypto with cash" then this thread aint for you. Please skip.Thank you,Ok, let's say you're serious. Do you really expect to get 10M here? There isn't many people on this forum who have so much money and probably they're not very interested to sell their Bitcoin for cash. Especially now, in bear market.And which one escrow you're going to use? 10M is huge money and even the most trusted escrow may scam for it.
